title: Documentation Crawler
content: The Documentation Crawler is a tireless scribe that traverses the vast libraries of technical knowledge, fetching and organizing documentation from specified sources. It enables AI agents to access up-to-date information through a structured API, ensuring that the wisdom of the latest specifications and guides is always within reach. Built on Node.js and Puppeteer, it navigates even the most complex documentation sites.
summary: A service for fetching and serving technical documentation from various sources
